name: Turn It
description:
Welcome to colorful world of Turn It !

In this game, you’re in control of multiple characters made of multiple colors.
While playing, you’ll be following color pattern in order pass falling obstacle, collecting coins and attempting to beat your high score. Pass through as many obstacles as you can before crashing into a different color than character.

Turn It includes:

1.    Simplistic colorful graphics.

2.    Multiple game modes to play.

3.    Various characters to unlock.

4.    Free gifts !

5.    Beat your friends score.

How to play:

1.    Tap the screen to rotate character.

2.    Match the color of your character with obstacle to score points.

3.    You will receive coins in the process.

NOTE - We recommend you to download from play store
